title: Student Enrollment (1-10)
description: The first lesson of the 120 Lessons, consisting of 10 questions and answers.

questions.question: Who is the Original Man?
questions.answer: The Original Man is the Asiatic Blackman, the Maker, the Owner, the Cream of the Planet Earth, Father of Civilization, and God of the Universe.

questions.question: Who is the Colored Man?
questions.answer: The Colored Man is the Caucasian (white man), or Yacub's grafted devil, the Skunk of the Planet Earth.

questions.question: What is the population of the Original Nation in the wilderness of North America, and all over the planet Earth?
questions.answer: The population of the Original Nation in the wilderness of North America is 17,000,000. With the 2,000,000 Indians makes it 19,000,000. All over the planet Earth is 4,400,000,000.

questions.question: What is the population of the Colored People in the wilderness of North America, and all over the planet Earth?
questions.answer: The population of the Colored People in the wilderness of North America is 103,000,000. All over the planet Earth is 400,000,000.

questions.question: What is the area in square miles of the planet Earth?
questions.answer: The square mileage of the Earth is 196,940,000 square miles.

questions.question: What are the exact square miles of the useful land that is used every day by the total population of the planet Earth?
questions.answer: The useful land that is used every day by the total population of the planet Earth is 29,000,000 square miles.

questions.question: What is the amount of the useful land that is used by the original man?
questions.answer: The original man uses 23,000,000 square miles.

questions.question: What is the amount of the useful land that is used by the colored man?
questions.answer: The colored man uses 6,000,000 square miles.

questions.question: What is the amount of the useful land that is used by the devil?
What is the main reason why the devil uses the useful land?
questions.answer: Because the devil is the skunk of the planet Earth.

title: English Lesson No. C1
description: Foundational lesson regarding the English language and usage.

questions.question: My name is W. F. Muhammad.
questions.answer: I came to North America by myself.

questions.question: My uncle was brought over here by the trader three hundred seventy-nine years ago.
questions.answer: My uncle cannot talk his own language.
